MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G15 area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Kinfauns Drive. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:40pm due to third party damage to our underground electricity network on Kinfauns drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3pm on Sunday, 21 February 2021
